name: Grass Ring of Sanctification
description:
After you switch characters: Deal 1 Electro DMG, heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 3
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters:</color> Deal 1 $[K104], heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>
